### `r fa("book-open")` Research Interests


```{r}
#| echo: false 
topics <- c("Applied Econometrics", "Digitalization and the Environment", "Energy Modeling", "Agent Based Models")
details2 <- c("Use of econometric methods for causal inference", 
              "Analysis of the inter-dependenencies between the transportation sector, digitalization, and the environment", 
              
              "Design and Implementation of optimization models to assess public policies for the decabornization of energy systems",
              
              "Design and implementation of agent-based models to understand households' adoption of green technologies ")


awards <- data.frame(topics,details2)


kable(align = 'rl',awards, booktabs= T,col.names = NULL) %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 12.5) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, color = "#696969", width = "12em") %>%
  column_spec(2, bold = FALSE, color = "#696969", width = "52.5em") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options ="hover")
```
